page.title: 20 Transport
page.content: {Transport}plays an important part in the lives of the people of the area. The{A1}passes close to Long Bennington linking it with Newark and Grantham. From the result of a questionaire 38% of the local people shop in Newark,and 41% in Grantham using private cars or the local bus services. The majority of people also travel to work in the surrounding areas, and sometimes as far as Nottingham, Essex and London. The nearby areas are also convenient bases for firms which operate all over the world, using the main road and rail links to reach airports. All kinds of transport are seen in the area articulated lorries, farm vehicles, bicycles, horses with riders or carriages and a{Sinclair C.5. driven by Mrs Margetts.As in original Domesday times, transport plays an important part in this rural area.
